patches.content:
Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -136,9 +136,9 @@

- Ours is an arrange marriage. The groom family sent a request over one of the matrimonial sites. We liked each other Both families are planning to arrange a meet-up to confirm the bride & groom's decision. My first arrange marriage meeting was arranged by our respective families on July 16 , 2023 ( that is our first meet up). The feeling of meeting someone unknown and having thoughts in mind that she/he would be a life partner is so exciting, had so many questions in our mind, managed to ask few of them. It was like something from inside that we liked each other a lot. We have been talking for nearly 15 mins.We saw each other and laughed.After one hour, they left & respective families said we will talk on phones after discussing with both of us .After they left everyone, The bride parents got a call after 15 mins from groom side that they r ready and then the bride family said we will let u know. Everybody was so happy. We was feeling confused because we never expected this to happen for us…eventually we said yes & we r going to marry❤️ + Our marriage was arranged through a request on one of the matrimonial sites. After getting to know each other, both families arranged a meeting to confirm the bride and groom's decision. Our first meeting took place on July 16, 2023, and it was a thrilling experience to meet someone unknown with thoughts of a lifelong partnership. We had so many questions in our minds, managed to ask a few, and, in the end, it was clear that we liked each other a lot. After talking for nearly 15 minutes, we saw each other and shared a genuine laugh. An hour later, our families left, promising to discuss our future over the phone. Just 15 minutes after they departed, the groom's family called to express their readiness, and we, on the bride's side, said we'd get back to them. Our hearts were filled with happiness and a bit of confusion because we never expected this to happen for us. In the end, we said yes, and we are excited to embark on this journey together❤️

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,542 @@ + + + + + + + + + + Ranjith & Sangeetha getting hitched! + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + + +

Ranjith & Sangeetha

+ + +
+
+
+
+
+
RS
+
+
+
+
+
+ +
+
+
+
+

We are getting hitched

+

The dates are 19th & 20th of October 2023 and we would like you to be a part of + it.

+ +
+
+
+
+ +
+
+
+
+

How we met

+
+
+
+
+
+

+ Our marriage was arranged through a request on one of the matrimonial sites. After getting to know each other, both families arranged a meeting to confirm the bride and groom's decision. Our first meeting took place on July 16, 2023, and it was a thrilling experience to meet someone unknown with thoughts of a lifelong partnership. We had so many questions in our minds, managed to ask a few, and, in the end, it was clear that we liked each other a lot. After talking for nearly 15 minutes, we saw each other and shared a genuine laugh. An hour later, our families left, promising to discuss our future over the phone. Just 15 minutes after they departed, the groom's family called to express their readiness, and we, on the bride's side, said we'd get back to them. Our hearts were filled with happiness and a bit of confusion because we never expected this to happen for us. In the end, we said yes, and we are excited to embark on this journey together❤️ +

+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+ +
+
+
+
+

Events

+
+
+
+
+
+

19th October

+ + +
+
+
Engagement After 6PM
+

This event is no way close to ethnic. The bride & groom would like to have some "shots before the + knot". With booze flowing down the floor and the western attire on, everyone would be busy + showing off their new moves on the stage which they have finely honed. Lastly, expect some beer + pong matches & karaoke for sure.

+
+
+
+
+

20th October

+ + +
+
+
Wedding 6AM - 7AM
+

This is the main event in the entire wedding when the bride and the groom tie the + knot. The groom comes with the barat and is greeted by the bride side with some dhol of course + as maximum number of guests would be attending this event. This is when the couple circle the + sacred fire and are finally declared husband and wife.

+
+
+
+ + +
+ +
+
+
+
+ +

Ugh... dress codes?

+
Mehndi 1PM - 5PM
+

+ Ethnic indian wear +
+ Ladies can wear something + bright & vivid + and gentlemen can be on + their vibrant + kurtas with pants or pyjamas along with an optional shawl. +

+
Cocktail Night 7PM - 12AM
+

+ Western attire +
+ A semi-formal look that is contemporary & fashionable which is not too prim & proper is the best + to pull off this night. You can see some pins for + ladies + & gents. +

+
Wedding 6PM-12AM
+

+ Indo-western +
+ Ladies can flaunt their unconventional sarees, + lehengas, + anarkalis, + dresses and the list + goes on whereas gentlemen can wear any kind of suit or just blazer. If you don't like to wear a + suit/blazer, you can do a high-neck + (band gala) waistcoat & shirt combo. +

+
+
+
+
+ +
+ +
+
+
+
+

A picture is worth a thousand words!

+

Help us capture the moment, tag your photos with the hashtag + #sangee_ranjith + + +

+
+
+
+
+ +
+
+
+
+ +
+
+
+
+

+
+

+

+

Our first meeting took place on July 16, 2023, and it was a thrilling experience to meet someone unknown with thoughts of a lifelong partnership. We had so many questions in our minds, managed to ask a few, and, in the end, it was clear that we liked each other a lot. After talking for nearly 15 minutes, we saw each other and shared a genuine laugh. An hour later, our families left, promising to discuss our future over the phone. Just 15 minutes after they departed, the groom's family called to express their readiness, and we, on the bride's side, said we'd get back to them. Our hearts were filled with happiness and a bit of confusion because we never expected this to happen for us. In the end, we said yes, and we are excited to embark on this journey together❤️ +

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
• How we met
  • Events
  • Instagram
  • Engagement
  • Glimpse of the city
  • Venue
  • RS

Ranjith & Sangeetha

RS

We are getting hitched

The dates are 19th & 20th of October 2023 and we would like you to be a part of it.

How we met

Ours is an arrange marriage. The groom family sent a request over one of the matrimonial sites. We liked each other Both families are planning to arrange a meet-up to confirm the bride & groom's decision. My first arrange marriage meeting was arranged by our respective families on July 16 , 2023 ( that is our first meet up). The feeling of meeting someone unknown and having thoughts in mind that she/he would be a life partner is so exciting, had so many questions in our mind, managed to ask few of them. It was like something from inside that we liked each other a lot. We have been talking for nearly 15 mins.We saw each other and laughed.After one hour, they left & respective families said we will talk on phones after discussing with both of us .After they left everyone, The bride parents got a call after 15 mins from groom side that they r ready and then the bride family said we will let u know. Everybody was so happy. We was feeling confused because we never expected this to happen for us…eventually we said yes & we r going to marry❤️

Events

19th October

Engagement After 6PM

This event is no way close to ethnic. The bride & groom would like to have some "shots before the knot". With booze flowing down the floor and the western attire on, everyone would be busy showing off their new moves on the stage which they have finely honed. Lastly, expect some beer pong matches & karaoke for sure.

20th October

Wedding 6AM - 7AM

This is the main event in the entire wedding when the bride and the groom tie the knot. The groom comes with the barat and is greeted by the bride side with some dhol of course as maximum number of guests would be attending this event. This is when the couple circle the sacred fire and are finally declared husband and wife.

Ugh... dress codes?

Mehndi 1PM - 5PM

Ethnic indian wear
Ladies can wear something bright & vivid and gentlemen can be on their vibrant kurtas with pants or pyjamas along with an optional shawl.

Cocktail Night 7PM - 12AM

Western attire
A semi-formal look that is contemporary & fashionable which is not too prim & proper is the best to pull off this night. You can see some pins for ladies & gents.

Wedding 6PM-12AM

Indo-western
Ladies can flaunt their unconventional sarees, lehengas, anarkalis, dresses and the list goes on whereas gentlemen can wear any kind of suit or just blazer. If you don't like to wear a suit/blazer, you can do a high-neck (band gala) waistcoat & shirt combo.

A picture is worth a thousand words!

Help us capture the moment, tag your photos with the hashtag #sangee_ranjith
